title: Swarna Kamal: Traditional Diamond & Ruby Stud Earrings
materials: Accented with a central Emerald (Panna). Crafted with a traditional Hyderabadi Polish (Minakari) for a rich
features: These captivating stud earrings feature a stylized floral design, reminiscent of a lotus (kamal), a symbol of purity and prosperity in South Indian culture. Delicately placed Polki diamonds surround a central emerald and are accented with ruby droplets, creating a visually stunning effect. The intricate gold filigree work showcases exceptional craftsmanship.
colors: complemented by the vibrant red of the rubies
the brilliant sparkle of the diamonds
and a touch of emerald green. This classic South Indian color combination symbolizes auspicious beginnings and blessings.
occasions: Perfect for both everyday elegance and special occasions like weddings (Pelli)
and traditional South Indian celebrations like Seemantham or half-saree functions (Langa Voni Function).
description: These earrings are a testament to the enduring beauty of South Indian jewelry traditions. The use of Polki diamonds, combined with the vibrant ruby accents and Hyderabadi polish, creates a piece that is both timeless and exquisite. They are designed to be cherished for generations, symbolizing heritage and elegance. Comfortable and secure, these studs are perfect for all-day wear.
